original_title: World War II: A War to Remember
overview: The Second World War was a conflict that touched every person in the land, a war packed with memories of hardship and losses, courage and sacrifice, humour and comradeship. This film, presented by Dame Vera Lynn, tells the story of the 8th May 1945, when the final curtain had finally come down on a drama that had been acted out across all corners of the globe, for six long hard years.
title: World War II: A War to Remember
